dimcat.pipeline package¶

Submodules¶

dimcat.pipeline.base module¶

A Pipeline performs computation iteratively on a List of PipelineSteps.

class dimcat.pipeline.base.Pipeline(pipeline_steps: List[PipelineStep])[source]¶

Bases: PipelineStep

A Pipeline takes at initialization a List of PipelineSteps, and processes the Data by iteratievly feeding the input Data into each PipelineStep in that list.

Note that a Pipeline is itself a PipelineStep, so can be included recursively in another Pipeline.

process_data(data: Data) → Data[source]¶

Process the given Data. This will feed the Data iteratively to each PipelineStep contained in its initialized pipeline_steps list.

Parameters:

data (Data) – The input Data on which some computation will be performed.

Returns:

The result of feeding the input Data into each step in this Pipeline. This will be exactly the output from the process_data function of the final PipelineStep.

Return type:

Data
